评论概述: Amazing dress but with a caveat
评论详情: Let me say first, that the dress was delivered on time. The fit was perfect and the dress is gorgeous! I purchased the reccomended size 20 and I am 5'8" and around 225lbs. I was a little worried when I was first putting it on that I might not be able to get it up over my hips/ butt, but without too much trouble I got it on. Honestly I could just pull it over my head if needed, it'sjust habit to pull it up. The dress was not at all baggy, though the length was a little long, it will work out perfectly as I plan on wearing low heels.  Now the downside. There was nothing wrong with the product itself, but when I opened the package, I noticed the bottom had hair on it. Unfortunately the more I looked, the worse it got. There was hair all over the dress. Obviously someone used and returned the dress but it wasn't inspected very well before being put back on the shelf. I don't have time to re-order and get a new one in time for my party, so I am going to try and clean it the best I can. But unfortunately that means I can't in good conscience give it the 5 stars I otherwise think this dress deserves.
Well made, but sadly did not fit my pregnant belly.

评论用户: I am returning this item. It does not look like the picture and the quality seems to be very low. I am very dissatisfied.

评论概述: Mother of the Groom Dress! Stunning
评论详情: I'm so thankful I went with this dress! This was supposed to be my backup but ended up being a hit! So many compliments and it was light and flowy and sparkled. My only concern was my shoes kept snagging at the bottom but that was only bc my shoes had gems that had got caught on the hem. If I had worn other shoes, it would've been fine. Satisfied with my purchase!

Liked the overall look and feel of this dress, but it bunched in the area around my butt where the bottom of the zipper area is so anytime I'd move around my room it'd bunch up in the back so I returned it. Might not occur to everyone though.

评论概述: POOR QUALITY - I  would give it a 0 if I could.  Amazon was not helpful in this return.
评论详情: I ordered the item in January in anticipation of my son's wedding in November.  I slipped the gown on upon arrival and put it away knowing it was the correct size and all I needed was to have my dress hemmed.  My scheduled appointment to hem the dress was coming up so I took the dress out, put it on and found the zipper was installed incorrectly causing a bulge next to the zipper.  This was unacceptable to wear to my son's wedding.  Having only a few days before  my seamstress appointment and knowing it would cost more than the gown, to try and repair it, if it could even be fixed, so I ordered three other gowns from Amazon.  Fortunately, one of those was perfect and I returned the other two from that order.  I know that the "returned date" for the defective (unworn) dress was well passed.  I contacted Amazon directly to see if they could make an exception due to the circumstances of this defective dress.  Very disappointingly, Amazon would not make an exception for a return on this defective item.  I will be sure to never order anything too early from Amazon again and will avoid purchasing from Ever-Pretty through Amazon.

This dress is really pretty in person. Lightweight, flowy, and elegant. The length is perfect and the quality is well made. Sadly I had to return it because it was way too small. I recommend ordering a size up if you're large chested (D-DD+) . The return process was great and I had my refund in 2 days. I ordered another dress from this company and it's absolutely perfect.

I wore this for my daughter’s wedding and got tons of compliments!  The color is gorgeous!  The fit was almost perfect!  The dress is extremely long and I did have to have it altered but it was an easy alteration.

Very difficult to zip with the ribbon. It takes two people to zip this dress. It does fit though. It is not difficult to zip because “I’m fat” which is very offensive to be told that. The fabric area is very thick where the ribbon is. Zipping the dress to the ribbon area is okay and zipping the dress once past the ribbon area is okay. But it is very difficult to zip where the ribbon area is. I’m wondering if the next size up would help, but I’m uncertain. Bride is freaking out with the wedding being in October this year… I contacted Amazon but since it is outside of the “return window,” there is nothing they can do. They said I had to contact the seller… This is very upsetting!! I sent a message to the seller and am waiting for a response. I hope the seller can help!

I think I looked great as the Officiant and Mother of the Groom. My Daughter in Law total approved. You can't beat that rating.

This dress is beautiful, however...per the size guide it should have been too big. I couldn't even zip it and since the zipper is iffy, trying to force it would not work.  I ordered a larger size and received the wrong dress.  I have reordered again in hopes of getting this one in the larger size.
The sequins on this dress is very pretty!! The tulle is a little long.. but overall very pretty!!

This dress was soooooo beautiful and fit great ( I’m 5’4” definitely a little long, I’m 250lb. I got a 2XL but needed a 3 cl. It worked well enough. But I had to send it back due to sequence falling off after a few hours of wear

My wife looked gorgeous in it. It was easy to move around in and she did a lot of dancing too. The dress looked pretty on her. And it didn’t need any fancy ironing or anything. She took it out of the packaging. Tried it. Hung it up on a hanger. And folded it for transport. Still stayed good.

评论概述: GORGEOUS dress!  I felt like a princess in it!
评论详情: I ordered this dress for a co-worker's formal wedding, and it arrived within a few days.  I usually wear a size 6 (5'9", 145lbs), and it fit perfectly.  I got so many compliments on it, and I felt like a princess.  I'm not sure what the "sheerness" rating is for....I thought it was opaque enough, you certainly couldn't seen my undergarments under it.  The weather was hot, and the dress was cool enough.  Can't wait to wear it again!

The Ever-Pretty Women's Formal Dress with Crew Neck, Sequin Ruffle Sleeves, and Empire Waist is a stunning choice for any special occasion. I purchased this dress specifically to wear to a Valentine's Day wedding, and it did not disappoint.  The dress features intricate beading and sequin detailing, adding a touch of glamour and sophistication. The crew neck and ruffle sleeves provide a feminine and elegant silhouette, while the empire waistline flatters the figure beautifully.  Not only is this dress stylish, but it's also incredibly comfortable to wear. The fabric is soft and lightweight, allowing for ease of movement on the dance floor. Plus, the length is perfect for a formal event, gracefully sweeping the floor as you walk.  Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Ever-Pretty Formal Dress. It's cute, elegant, and perfect for a romantic occasion like a Valentine's Day wedding. I received numerous compliments throughout the evening, and I felt confident and beautiful wearing it. Highly recommended!
So beautiful and comfortable.
This dress is great for the price. The length is perfect for me, and I am 5’9”. It looks nice on my fuller bust while also making my waist look small. It’s perfect to wear in my friend’s wedding.
Dress was beautiful and made well. Didn't realize tule is itchy
Not as expected
Stretchy comfortable  I had it shortened I didn't want floor length.  I am 5'3" 195 lbs

I can't explain how many complements I got on these. I'm so happy I found dresses that I loved and my bridesmaids felt beautiful in! Very flattering on all the body types. You'll love it I promise. Good quality and gorgeous dusty blue.
The dress was very pretty, however it did not fit me. The material looked and felt like good quality.

I bought this for my son’s wedding outside. I loved it but I wore flats & it was to long. I was disappointed that I had to return it to someone else & not Amazon. I couldn’t print out a return slip & take it to post office. So I gave it to Good Will

评论概述: Warning  that dress is delivered wrinkled and allow time if purchased to address.
评论详情: The dress is pretty however DELIVERY in mailbox for wedding gown caused numerous wrinkles! Will need to get to dry cleaner before weekend to get pressed! Not impressed, have little time to deal with such unexpected issues!

This is the second color (I also bought the gray which looks more like silver) I have purchased this dress in.  It is true to size, comfortable to wear and looks fantastic on.  If you have a bit if tummy bulge to hide, this is perfect solution. The sleeve length is great for any age. The dress drapes well and flows beautifully as you walk or dance.  Love this dress.

评论概述: Very pretty and best of all it looked nice on me.
评论详情: The outer layer of tulle is not the really soft version.  It’s a little stiff and itchy.  It came very wrinkled.  It is very flattering.  It needs hemming and a couple reviews mentioned that you need a slip so I heeded that advice.  I really like this dress.
Many compliments on the dress, my daughter loved it. A tad difficult to zip up around ribbon. Dress for, but borders on being too small. Size up.

Definitely order a few sizes up from your street size. It has some stretch but not much. The dress is absolutely beautiful and perfect, I love it. May exchange for a larger size but definitely considering it for my wedding dress. You would think the mesh would be itchy but it's only occurring around the zipper area and nowhere else, tolerable. Very long. I am 5"8 and it hits/drags on the floor. Needs hemmed or wear heels. It is extremely flattering.

评论概述: Beautiful but not for a petite person
评论详情: This dress is beautiful. The top is so sparkly and I loved the mesh skirt. I was so disappointed that I had to return it. I'm very short waisted and this just didn't fit well. I even considered keeping the dress because I liked it so much and having it altered.

This product wasn’t made well. The fabric was cheap. I tried to get the free return they promised, but it was not free. I had to pay to send it back. I wouldn’t have bought it to try if I had known the hassle involved in returning it.

评论概述: Love it! Easy to bring in the waist
评论详情: I ordered this for my wedding coming up, and ordered it a bit too big out of fear that it would be too small. After trying it on over the course of the past month, I realized the waist was a tad too big, which was what I intended. I was happy to find the ribbon on the waist was a tad stretchable, so I brought the waist in and thank goodness it wasn't difficult. I'm so happy the material wasn't difficult to bring in and now it fits like a glove
Gracias por traerlo bendiciones
Fit well, but maybe order a size up.

My son set his wedding day for December, so I was on the lookout for a great dress. I was very excited and I started looking as soon as the date was set. Their wedding colors were black and maroon. I saw this dress in maroon, but I decided to go with gray because it would go well, but would not clash with the wedding party. While I received many compliments tonight, I wasn’t exactly comfortable. First of all, PLEASE KNOW THAT YOU CANNOT wear a bra with this dress. I did have this dress for several months, so it was my fault that I didn’t figure this out before the big day. Also,  if you carry any weight in your stomach, the light gray color accentuates it. I wish I would’ve ordered this dress in black instead. I’m just giving this info for a heads up.

This dress was so pretty. I wore it to my work Christmas party got so many compliments! I am usually a size 2-3x I got a size 20 and it was a bit snug but did zip up after help! So if you’re debating on to size up I would say maybe do it if you have a wider torso/ribcage area or back. But overall it was so pretty loved it.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress, affordable and good fit!
评论详情: Bought as a bridesmaid dress. Beautiful dress, design was just as pictured, no problem with the zippers, just be patient when zipping up. The inner lining was slightly see through but nothing drastic. Fit was exactly as Size chart I'm a medium, 5'1. Received lots of compliments. 4 stars because there were a few loose threads on the bust which I had to cut. It was a bit long on me, so I took off about 2 inches.
I got so many compliments wearing this dress. The only thing is that I am short so it was a little long
It is a nice dress but did not fit from top

The dress is lovely. The lace on the top half isn't scratchy, did seem to run bigger.  The bottom half of the gown was full and flows.  It would have needed to be hemmed if I was going to keep it.  Material was good quality.

Before I ordered the dress I took my measurements. Going by that I picked the size. I’ve never ordered that big of size before and that includes me loosing 40 pounds. Once I got it and I tried it on the dress was huge on me. I had to find a seamstress to basically remake the dress. It was so big she has to take it in everywhere! I bought it for my daughter’s wedding for me. I love the dress but you definitely can’t trust their measurements!

The dress fits comfortably and is very elegant. However, it does not have any stretch so I suggest going up a size. I normally wear a 12 in dresses but ordered up in a 14. It fit perfectly with the exception that I had to have the dress altered as I am 5'2' and around 165 lbs. It was about 4" too long and I wore 3 1/2" stilettos. No complaints and had a lot of compliments especially in the haze blue color. I feel any color would be flattering.
Just know that when you order a gown you normally buy a size up from your pant size.

Honest review:  I really liked the dress, very pretty! But I strongly disliked how it arrived. For such an elegant dress for a special occasion, it came in a bag, just a bag, forlded but in a very smallish bag. Right away I thought, uh oh. And boy was I right! The tulle or whatever the outer fabric is on the Very Long skirt was so wrinkled it was horrible! I did not know how or even IF I could ever get the wrinkles out. I sent it back. Too bad they cannot sent it in a nice dress box, much bigger and carefully folded. This was just a sack on my front porch, I didn’t even think it could hold the dress I ordered. Sad because it is the style and everything I was looking for.

I absolutely adored this dress!! The zipper was sturdy, the material was comfortable, the fit was PERFECT and I have very large breasts, so that was a happy surprise. It is a little bit on the sheer side, so I bought a skin colored shape wear and it worked really well. Had a very happy wedding day, got MANY compliments and felt like a princess. And paid only $80 for a dress I will only ever wear once. Lovely, really ❤️
Keeps u comfortable while working out nice
Fits week
Not the very best quality of material, but good for the price.  Pretty well made.  Way too long.

评论概述: Nice dress but not true size for me.
评论详情: I needed this exact color for a wedding. The dress looks nice, and the delivery was great. I followed the size guidelines but decided to get one size smaller than recommended. Well, it was still too big on my waist and besides cutting the length, I had it altered to fit my waist as well. I'm 5'2'', usually wear size L or M. Ordered size 14.
Dress was beautiful, loved the length, material and color. Just took to the cleaners to take all the wrinkles out and that was all .
I wore this dress to my son's wedding. I got many compliments. It fit true to size, perhaps maybe a tad smaller than true to size so if you're unsure, size up.

We bought this dress for my daughter's senior prom. We purchased a 16 and it fit perfectly but it was slightly long. Her measurements are 5'4"/190LB/36DD. We did purchase a strapless bra for it as well. The color was exactly what she wanted and the lace detail was beautiful. It came fairly wrinkled so, be prepared to steam those out. Would absolutely recommend!

Although I had to return this because it was too fancy it’s a beautiful dress. It runs small but it was comfortable when I ordered the right size. It looked amazing but I had to order a less fancy dress for the event.
I would have had to have this hemmed, but other than that, I liked how this gown felt on me, I just chose a different one

I ordered the stress long before my event because I just knew I would have to get it altered because nothing ever fits me. I am short with a large bust so I typically have to decide between ordering too big to fit the rest of my body or too tight to fit my bust. I was not expecting to put in my measurements and when it asked for them I thought it wasn't going to come out decent. I am absolutely blown away by the fact that out of the package this dress fit me as if it were made for me. Not only does it fit me but it also is very high quality stitching. I will likely never order dresses from another maker again.

评论概述: Beautiful gown but way too long. Go for alterations.
评论详情: This is absolutely a beautiful gown. However, I'm going to have to have it custom done. Because it was way too long and it was way long wasted and the neck to waist was too long. To be fair I'm 5'2" . If your long and tall this might work for you. I did go for the custom for $30. for alterations and it fits perfectly and even more beautiful.
The dress is beautiful, but the top is extremely small.  I couldn't even zip it.

Did not like the material. Is was not hemmed  the material on sleeves was not even  Over all felt and looked cheap
The dress was all full of pulled out threads and not fixable. So I didn't use it. I know there are different vendors, it's not necessarily your fault but I think you need to know
This is a beautiful dress and made well but definitely size up. I wear an 8 and ended up having to get a 12. It definitely does not have any stretch to it.

评论概述: I sized up and this fit perfectly.
评论详情: I wore this dress to the Bridgerton experience and it was perfect. Didn't get to hot and it was very comfortable and flowy. I sized up which was a good choice since I am typically a size 14 but have a larger chest and this was perfect. I got lots of compliments.

It's not the dress, it's my body shape. I guess I should have ordered a customized dress. Actually when I tried to order a custom dress, I only wanted one for myself, but was ordering two dresses. One for my mom and one for myself. The system would only allow me to order two custom dresses or two regular sized dresses. Anyway, I will have to tweek this dress to make it work, but I want you to know if I ever have to order elegant dresses like this again, I will definitely order from Ever-Pretty!! They are very beautiful and my mom loooooks wonderful!! I'll have to check with her if I can include her picture, but will definitely let you know!

I wore this dress as a mother of the bride. I had to do a few alterations. Great fabric and well made. I got many compliments. Buy this dress. You won’t be disappointed

The dress was longer than expected. I like the fit and comfort once I had the dress shorten.  I wore the dress for a wedding.
I loved the gown. But no longer needed. I thought it was beautiful but my sister went with another option. So I went and returned it.
I purchased this gown for a gala and it fit perfectly! Loved the color!
I love the way I look in this dress. This qaa my 3rd one. Im 210 5'2" I first ordered 18 did not fit, then 20 also not fit. Finally I had to get a 22 it was a hit!

My daughter chose this one (we ordered 3 others). She usually never wears dresses, but needed something for the 8th grade formal. She said it was very comfortable and made her feel pretty. She wore it with Converses and at 5’2, it was a little long. The dress was a little difficult to zip, but we worked it out and seems to be decent quality.
Dress was way too big and didn't really like the tulle over it.

评论详情: I ordered my normal size and it fit me perfectly. The only small problem was It was about 1/2" too long. Can't wait to wear it for the wedding. The color sky blue was beautiful!
